about_the_game:
Run Dungeon combines the heart-pounding action of an endless runner combined with the strategic depth of an RPG. An infinite dungeon full of monsters, loot, traps, spells, and bosses awaits you.

Endless Runner meets Enemy Waves

Imagine the heart-pounding action of an endless runner combined with the strategic depth of an RPG. Run Dungeon offers just that- a high-speed adventure set in an infinite dungeon filled with monsters, traps, and treasures. With every step, the dungeon grows more perilous, and only the bravest will thrive.

Monsters and Magic

Face off against a myriad of monstrous foes, from slimes and skeletons to ogres and mages. Arm yourself with swords, staffs, and spells found in treasure chests scattered throughout the dungeon. As you vanquish your enemies and survive against the odds, you'll gain experience, level up, and unlock even more formidable challenges and rewards.

Loot, Level Up, and Customize

Your hero’s journey is one of constant growth and discovery. With every run, accumulate powerful equipment, cast devastating spells, and collect potions to aid in your survival. Each piece of gear not only enhances your stats but also prepares you for the dangers that lie ahead. Though your levels reset with each run, the thrill of progression and strategy never fades.

Shop and Enhance

Collected gold from your expeditions? Visit the Gold Shop to spend your hard-earned treasure on power-ups and enhancements. From double jumps and flame swords to speed boots and beyond, customize your hero for the ultimate dungeon running experience.

Stylish and Smooth

Designed with a low poly art style for a unique aesthetic appeal, Run Dungeon promises high frame rates and stellar performance across a wide range of computers.

Safe for All Ages
With no blood, swears, alcohol, or drugs, and only cartoon violence, Run Dungeon is crafted for gamers of all ages. Dive into a game that’s as inviting as it is exciting, perfect for both casual fun and hardcore challenges.

Are You Ready?

The dungeon calls. Will you answer? Sharpen your sword, ready your spells, and step into the endless adventure of Run Dungeon. Where will your run end?

name: RUN DUNGEON

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K | AMD Ryzen™ 5 5600 6-Core or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050, RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard audio
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 3GB or AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 MB available space

short_description: Run Dungeon combines the heart-pounding action of an endless runner combined with the strategic depth of an RPG. An infinite dungeon full of monsters, loot, traps, spells, and bosses awaits you.
